text: J. Jonah Jameson is a fictional Spider-Man character appearing in publications by Marvel Comics. == Fictional character biography == He is the chief-editor of the Daily Bugle. He is the boss of Peter Parker. He thinks that Spider-Man is a bad influence. He is the father of John Jameson. == In other media == The character has appeared in different forms of media including toys, movies, and television series. He was played by J. K. Simmons in the movies Spider-Man, Spider-Man 2, Spider-Man 3, Spider-Man: Far From Home and in Spider-Man: No Way Home. ==Other websites== *Marvel Directory entry *SpiderFan.org: J.Jonah Jameson *Samruby.com: Profile on JJJ *J Jonah Jameson on the Marvel Universe Character Bio Wiki Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1963 Category:Marvel Comics supporting characters Category:Spider-Man
title: J. Jonah Jameson
